Aircash is multi-currency virtual cash Wallet and the issuer of the Aircash card. Funds are deposited on the Aircash Wallet in cash or by Visa, Maestro, Mastercard, Diners, Discover and JCB credit/debit cards. Money can be withdrawn instantly in cash at ATMs, at the Aircash partner’s point of sales as well as to any Croatian bank account. It allows users to send money to family and friends, buy and sell foreign currencies, buy tickets for buses, ferries and catamarans, buy tickets for sport and other events as well as pay utility bills, parking, tolls, buy vouchers, games, lottery tickets and similar.

AIRCASH CARD
The Aircash card can be bought at all partner points of sale and used at more than 30 million locations worldwide: online, in stores, at ATMs... The card is managed within the Aircash wallet which can always be topped up with cash, card payments and receipt of funds on Aircash.

DEPOSIT
Money can be deposited in cash onto the Aircash wallet at any Aircash partner’s point of sale or by Visa, Maestro, Mastercard, Diners, Discover and JCB credit and debit cards, instantly and without any fees.

TRANSFER
Money can be transferred from the Aircash wallet in any currency and from any country in the world to friends or family in just a few clicks in a quick and secure way. Money is immediately available to the recipient.

MARKETPLACE
Aircash wallet can also be used to buy tickets for buses, ferries and catamarans, buy tickets for sport and other events as well as to conveniently exchange foreign currency, pay utility bills, parking, tolls, buy PlayStation vouchers, games, lottery tickets and to top-up online user and telecom accounts at the Aircash partner in just a few seconds.

WITHDRAWAL
Money from the Wallet can be withdrawn instantly in cash at any PBZ ATM, on Aircash partner's point of sales at thousands of locations across Croatia as well as to any Croatian bank account.

LOCATIONS
Aircash partner’s points of sale where cash deposits or withdrawals can be made at any time of the day are currently all Tisak and iNovine news stands as well as Ina and Tifon gas stations in Croatia. Alongside the aforementioned locations, withdrawal is also possible at any PBZ ATMs across Croatia.

Stvarno brzo i jednostavno
Skini i instaliraj aplikaciju u svega 2 minute, a onda šalji ili zatraži lovu od frendova. Podatke za primanje i slanje love trebaš upisati samo jednom, a od frenda nijednom. Pozovi frenda
Lovu možeš poslati i nekome tko nema KEKS Pay. On će dobiti SMS s uputama za preuzimanje aplikacije, a potom i tvoje uplate, u samo nekoliko klikova. Sigurnost prije svega

Zagrebačka banka posvećuje posebnu pozornost sigurnosti korisnika mobilnog bankarstva.

Erste mBanking usluga je mobilnog bankarstva Erste banke kojom jednostavno i sigurno možete obavljati sve svoje financijske transakcije pametnim telefonom, a uz standardnu identifikaciju 4-znamenkastim mPIN-om, ili biometrijom.
 
Jedinstveni zaslon za unos naloga još više olakšava plaćanja i prijenos sredstava. Opcija Slikaj i plati, s kojom je ručno popunjavanje naloga postalo prošlost, sad vam je nadohvat prsta, a umjesto internim prijenosom sva kunska plaćanja zadajete na jednom zaslonu.
 
Korisnici mogu učitavati fakture iz galerije ili skenirati pojedine elemente fakture, pregledavati i potpisivati naloge u kunskim datotekama te naručivati izvode i fakture za svoje poslovne račune uz znatno niže naknade.
 
Sigurnu prijavu u usluge e-bankarstva omogućuje mToken - jednostavna opcija unutar mBankinga koja unosom 4-znamenkastog mPIN-a daje kontrolu nad vlastitim transakcijama. mToken je besplatan, a za njegovo je korištenje potrebno imati ugovorenu uslugu NetBanking ili FonBanking te potom preuzeti mBanking aplikaciju.
 
Osim navedenoga, Erste mBanking omogućuje:
 
* praćenje stanja i prometa po svim Erste računima
* pregledavanje svih transakcija zadanih putem mBankinga i NetBankinga
* plaćanje svih vrsta računa u kunama općom uplatnicom te izvršavanje obveza po kreditima i obavljanje kupoprodaje deviza
* pregledavanje oročene štednje i kredita i postavljanje zahtjeva za predodobrenim kreditom
* pregledavanje stanja, transakcija i računa kreditnih kartica
* pregledavanje ugovorenih fondova te zadavanje zahtjeva za otkup i izdavanje fondova
* pregledavanje tečajne liste i preračunavanje valuta
* pronalazak najbliže Erste poslovnice ili Erste bankomata
* aktivaciju mBankinga preko aplikacije, bez odlaska u poslovnicu
* pregledavanje i ažuriranje osobnih podataka
 
Minimalna podržana verzija iOS-a je 12.0.
Za korištenje Touch ID funkcionalnosti potrebno je imati model iPhone 5S ili noviji.
 Erste mBanking is Erste Bank's mobile banking service, which enables you to carry out all financial transactions using only your smartphone. Depending on settings and devices, it provides authentication by 4-digit mPIN or with biometry.

The unique/unified payment screen makes payments and fund transfers even easier. The PhotoPay feature, with which manually filling orders has become a thing of the past, is now at your fingertips, and the internal transfer option has been incorporated into a single screen, where you can make all types of national payments.

You can upload invoices from the gallery or scan parts of the invoice, review and sign orders for national payment files, and order statements and invoices for their business accounts with significantly lower fees.

Erste Bank's secure e-banking services are accessible via mToken, a simple option  within the mBanking app that lets you control all your financial transactions via a  4-digit mPIN. As a NetBanking or FonBanking user, you can download the free mBanking app and start using the mToken option.

In addition to the above, Erste mBanking allows:

* monitoring of balance and traffic by all Erste accounts,
* view all transactions made on mBanking and NetBanking,
* payment of all types of national invoices by general payment slip, execution of obligations per loans, and conducting foreign currency purchases,
* reviewing terms of savings and loans as well as setting requirements for a pre-approved loan,
* check balances, transactions, and view credit card accounts,
* reviewing contracted funds and issuing requests for the purchase and issuance of funds,
* viewing exchange rates and converting currencies,
* assistance in locating the nearest Erste branch or Erste ATM,
* activation of the mBanking app through the application itself, without visiting the branch,
* view and update of personal information.
 
Minimal version requirement: iOS 12.
 
The Touch ID feature is available on iPhone 5s or later.

Porezni obveznici koji su korisnici mobilnih uređaja mogu kroz mobilnu aplikaciju ostvariti uvid u svoje podatke, zaprimljene poruke i porezne akte, mogu podnositi zahtjeve, dobiti važne informacije o svojim poreznim obvezama i poslati upit Poreznoj upravi koji se tiče sustava ePorezna i mPorezna.

Porezni obveznici putem aplikacije mogu vidjeti i stanje na porezno knjigovodstvenoj kartici (PKK), preuzeti 2D barkod za provođenje plaćanja, pregledati detalje podnesenih obrazaca i zahtjeva, provjeriti obavijesti i rokove podnošenja obrazaca kroz personalizirani porezni kalendar, mogu podnijeti zahtjev za izmjenom podataka na poreznoj kartici (PK), zahtjev za izdavanje potvrde o stanju duga, zahtjev za izmjenom podataka u Registru poreznih obveznika, informativno izračunati podatke o plaći putem usluge kalkulatora za izračun plaće, direktno se obratiti Poreznoj upravi putem servisa „Pišite nam“ te anonimno prijaviti porezni i drugi prekršaj.

Također, poreznim obveznicima omogućen je  uvid u podatke iz JOPPD obrasca (Izvješće o primicima, porezu na dohodak i prirezu te doprinosima za obvezna osiguranja) za korisnika usluge, Uvid u IP1/IP2 - uvid u podatke o plaći, mirovini, doprinosima, porezu i prirezu koji ulaze u godišnji obračun (obračunati i isplaćeni primici) i Uvid u IP3 - uvid u podatke o plaći, mirovini, doprinosima, porezu i prirezu koji ne ulaze u godišnji obračun.

Funkcionalnosti su prilagođene radu na manjim ekranima kako bi iskustvo korištenja bilo optimalno uz mogućnost podešavanja veličine slova i boje ekrana. Za korištenje aplikacije potrebno se prijaviti putem Nacionalnog identifikacijskog i autentifikacijskog sustava (NIAS) koristeći jednu od priznatih vjerodajnica NIAS sustava. Za prijavu u aplikaciju potrebno je posjedovati valjanu NIAS vjerodajnicu značajne ili niske razine sigurnosti: značajna razina sigurnosti uključuje na primjer mToken, Fina Soft certifikat, token/mtoken uređaje banaka koji su povezani sa sustavom NIAS dok niska razina sigurnosti uključuje ePass, ePošta, AAI@EduHr korisničko ime i lozinku, HT Telekom ID.

Strateški cilj Porezne uprave je dvostrana elektronička komunikacija Porezne uprave i poreznih obveznika, stoga je uspostava elektroničkih usluga na mobilnim platformama značajan korak u širenju kruga korisnika i proširenja dostupnosti elektroničkih usluga Porezne uprave poreznim obveznicima. U sklopu ovog projekta razvijene su nove funkcionalnosti sustava ePorezna kroz uspostavu krovne mobilne aplikacije mPorezna unutar koje će se kroz funkcije mobilnih aplikacija omogućiti povećanje dostupnosti elektroničkih usluga Porezne uprave građanima i poduzetnicima.

Sadržaj mobilne aplikacije isključiva je odgovornost Ministarstva financija – Porezne uprave, a razvijena je od tvrtke APIS IT d.o.o.

The Bitcoin.com Wallet, trusted by millions, is an easy-to-use, multichain, self-custodial crypto wallet that puts you in full control of all your crypto holdings.

It allows you to:

- Buy Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ethereum (ETH), Avalanche (AVAX), and select ERC-20 tokens quickly and easily via credit card, Apple Pay, and more.
- Sell BTC, BCH, ETH, AVAX, and select ERC-20 tokens into your local currency (in select regions).
- Send, receive, and swap between BTC, BCH, ETH, AVAX, USDT, USDC, and a huge range of ERC-20 tokens.
- Access DeFi apps that enable use cases like earning interest on your crypto, borrowing and lending, participating in NFT marketplaces, synthetic assets, and more.

Other key features include:

SELF-CUSTODIAL

Your cryptoassets are ultra-secure because only you can access them. Self-custodial means not even Bitcoin.com has access to your funds, and you can easily port your assets to another crypto wallet whenever you want. No lock-ins, and you'll never again ask for permission to use *your* money.

DEFI READY

Connect to Ethereum and Avalanche DApps via WalletConnect. That means you can earn interest on your crypto, trade using decentralized exchanges, participate in NFT marketplaces, access lending markets and much, much more.

QUICK & SECURE ACCESS

Unlock your Wallet app with biometrics or PIN.

AUTOMATED BACKUP

Conveniently back up all your wallets to the cloud and decrypt them with a single master password. Replace the hassle of managing numerous secret phrases with the convenience and security of a single custom password. (You can still opt to manually manage your individual seed phrases).

CUSTOMIZABLE FEES

You decide the network fee. Up the fee for faster network confirmations. Lower it when you're not in a rush. Bitcoin.com takes ZERO fees (you pay only to use the public blockchain networks).

LOW-FEE CHAINS

The multichain [Bitcoin.com](http://Bitcoin.com) Wallet is committed to giving you access to low-fee public blockchains so that you can use peer-to-peer cash as it was intended AND make the most of the opportunities available in the web3 space. 

AVALANCHE SUPPORT
Now you can buy, sell, swap, hold and manage AVAX, the native token of the Avalanche blockchain. 

SHARED WALLETS (MULTI-SIG)

Create multi-signature wallets to manage funds with your team or friends and family.

WIDGETS

Install live market-data widgets on your home screen. Track BTC, BCH, ETH, AVAX and your favorite ERC-20 tokens throughout your day.

MARKETS VIEW
Track the price action and get key info on the top cryptocurrencies.

PERSONAL NOTES

Add text to your transactions to remind you who sent what, when, and where.

SEND VIA SOCIAL

For BCH, thanks to low network fees and near-instant confirmation time, you can send a payment link (aka "Sharable Link") to anyone using any channel (eg. Messenger, SMS, email, Whatsapp, and so on.). Funds are received/claimed instantly with just one click.

INSTANTPAY

Set your spending threshold, then scan a QR code with the request amount set on the recipient's device. Your payment will complete in an instant (BCH only).

DISCOVER

Use the Discover section in the app to locate merchants near you who accept cryptocurrency payments in-store. Browse websites where you can checkout with crypto and find other cool features like games, gift cards, and more.

CUSTOMIZABLE DISPLAY CURRENCY

Choose your preferred display currency alongside your crypto (eg. USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, CAD, AUD, and more).

ORGANIZE YOUR HOLDINGS

Create any number of wallets to organize your funds as you see fit. Drag and drop to re-order your wallets, and hide wallet balances that you don't want prying eyes to see.

AUDITED BY KUDELSKI SECURITY

A comprehensive 2022 audit from the renowned cybersecurity experts proved there is no real-world scenario in which an attacker would be able to compromise a user’s private keys.

You already have a pillar 3a? Using the app makes sense for you too. frankly is half the price of comparable securities savings offers (Source: moneyland.ch). You can directly transfer your pillar 3a to frankly in just four steps.

The advantages of frankly:

• Open an account in just a few minutes

All you need is a smartphone and an ID card and you’re ready to go. Needless to say, we’ll help you every step of the way.

• Simple & understandable – entirely online

With frankly you can manage your 3a retirement planning in the app and check your performance at any time.

• Deposit as little as CHF 1

You decide yourself how much you want to deposit. There is no minimum deposit and no minimum term.

• You save on taxes

With every franc you pay into your pillar 3a, you reduce your taxable income up to the maximum amount and so save on taxes! This means you benefit twice over.

• Investment products chosen by you

The main goal is to build up your savings. With your strategy you decide how much risk you are willing to take and how much value you want to place on sustainability.

• Easy to switch

Do you already have an existing pillar 3a? We offer you an easy and free transfer service. We pay your transaction fees and account closing costs (applies to transferring pillar 3a accounts from bank foundations).

•  frankly is cost-effective

Saving with securities with frankly is half as expensive as with comparable offers (Source: moneyland.ch). Please note that indexed investment products incur in particular issuing and redemption fees payable to the fund, which are not included in the all-in fee. You can find a more detailed definition of the all-in fee in the FAQ.

• Our community discount

The more pension assets managed by frankly, the cheaper the all-in fee becomes for everyone. As more users join, frankly becomes even more affordable. Planning your private pension like this is fun.

• Security and experience

frankly was developed by Zürcher Kantonalbank for its pension foundation.
